title: Project Planning and Management
description: Establish project goals, scope, timeline, and resource allocation. Define project management processes and communication channels.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct research on natural photosynthesis processes and existing carbon capture technologies. Gather requirements from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for the BionicTreeCarbonCapture project, including components for CO2 absorption, energy conversion, and storage. Define interfaces, data flow, and communication protocols, ensuring scalability, fault tolerance, security aspects, and environmental impact. Propose a modular and extensible design to accommodate future enhancements and integration with other systems. Outline the testing strategy for the system architecture design and provide detailed documentation. This RFC will be reviewed and decomposed by the task-decomposer before being assigned to appropriate developers. The proposed design should also consider potential AI/ML integration for optimizing CO2 absorption and energy conversion efficiency. (Note: This RFC is approved, but it still needs review and decomposition by the task-decomposer.)

title: Prototype Development
description: Build a functional prototype of the BionicTreeCarbonCapture system for proof of concept and testing.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Assess security risks and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards for carbon capture and storage technologies.
